verses.verse: And the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> assembled <S%H6950>together<s%> at <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, and set <S%H7931>up<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H776>there<s%>. And the land was <S%H3533>subdued<s%> before <S%H6440>them<s%>.
And there <S%H3498>remained<s%> among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, which had not yet <S%H2505>received<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, How long are you <S%H7503>slack<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> has given <S%H5414>you<s%>?

Give <S%H3051>out<s%> from among you <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> for each <S%H7626>tribe<s%>: and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H6965>them<s%>, and they shall rise, and <S%H1980>go<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H3789>describe<s%> it <S%H6310>according<s%> to the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H935>them<s%>; and they shall come again to me.

And they shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> it into <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2506>parts<s%>: <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H5975>stay<s%> in their <S%H1366>coast<s%> on the <S%H5045>south<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> shall <S%H5975>stay<s%> in their <S%H1366>coasts<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%>.

You shall therefore <S%H3789>describe<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> into <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2506>parts<s%>, and <S%H935>bring<s%> the description here to <S%H3384>me<s%>, that I may cast <S%H1486>lots<s%> for you here <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>.

But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> have no <S%H2506>part<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H3550>you<s%>; for the priesthood of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>: and <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, have <S%H3947>received<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> gave <S%H5414>them<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and went <S%H3212>away<s%>: and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them that <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H3789>describe<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H3789>describe<s%> <S%H7725>it<s%>, and come again to <S%H7993>me<s%>, that I may here cast <S%H1486>lots<s%> for you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H3789>described<s%> it by <S%H5892>cities<s%> into <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2506>parts<s%> in a <S%H5612>book<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> again to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> to the <S%H4264>host<s%> at <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for them in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and there <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H2505>divided<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to their <S%H4256>divisions<s%>.

And the <S%H1486>lot<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>: and the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of their <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> between the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>.

And their <S%H1366>border<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> was from <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H5927>side<s%>, and went up through the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>; and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> there were at the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H1007>Beth<s%>–aven.

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5674>over<s%> from there toward <S%H3870>Luz<s%>, to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H3870>Luz<s%>, which is <S%H1008>Beth<s%>–el, <S%H5045>southward<s%>; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%> to <S%H5853>Ataroth<s%>–adar, near the <S%H2022>hill<s%> that lies on the south <S%H5045>side<s%> of the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H1032>Beth<s%>–horon.

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> was <S%H8388>drawn<s%> <S%H5437>there<s%>, and compassed the <S%H6285>corner<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%>, from the <S%H2022>hill<s%> that lies <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1032>Beth<s%>–horon <S%H5045>southward<s%>; and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> there were at <S%H7154>Kirjath<s%>–baal, which is <S%H7157>Kirjath<s%>–jearim, a <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: this was the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>quarter<s%>.

And the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>quarter<s%> was from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H7157>Kirjath<s%>–jearim, and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H4599>well<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5318>Nephtoah<s%>:

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> that lies <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%>, and which is in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of the <S%H7497>giants<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and <S%H3381>descended<s%> to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%>, to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H2983>Jebusi<s%> on the <S%H5045>south<s%>, and <S%H3381>descended<s%> to <S%H5883>En<s%>–rogel,

And was <S%H8388>drawn<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and went <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H5885>En<s%>–shemesh, and went <S%H3318>forth<s%> toward <S%H1553>Geliloth<s%>, which is over <S%H5227>against<s%> the going <S%H4608>up<s%> of <S%H131>Adummim<s%>, and <S%H3381>descended<s%> to the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H932>Bohan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>,
And passed <S%H5674>along<s%> toward the <S%H3802>side<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>, and went <S%H3381>down<s%> unto <S%H6160>Arabah<s%>:

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> passed <S%H5674>along<s%> to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H1031>Beth<s%>–hoglah <S%H6828>northward<s%>: and the <S%H8444>outgoings<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> were at the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3956>bay<s%> of the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> at the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>: this was the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%>.

And <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> was the <S%H1379>border<s%> of it on the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>. This was the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, by the <S%H1367>coasts<s%> there round <S%H5439>about<s%>, according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

Now the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> were <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, and <S%H1031>Beth<s%>–hoglah, and the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7104>Keziz<s%>,
And <S%H1026>Beth<s%>–arabah, and <S%H6787>Zemaraim<s%>, and <S%H1008>Beth<s%>–el,
And <S%H5761>Avim<s%>, and <S%H6511>Parah<s%>, and <S%H6084>Ophrah<s%>,
And <S%H3726>Chephar<s%>–haammonai, and <S%H6078>Ophni<s%>, and <S%H1387>Gaba<s%>; <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>:
<S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>, and <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>, and <S%H881>Beeroth<s%>,
And <S%H4708>Mizpeh<s%>, and <S%H3716>Chephirah<s%>, and <S%H4681>Mozah<s%>,
And <S%H7552>Rekem<s%>, and <S%H3416>Irpeel<s%>, and <S%H8634>Taralah<s%>,

And <S%H6762>Zelah<s%>, <S%H507>Eleph<s%>, and <S%H2983>Jebusi<s%>, which is <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H1394>Gibeath<s%>, and <S%H7157>Kirjath<s%>; <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>. This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.
